title: Fairy Tail S
alternative_title: Fairy Tail S: Tales from Fairy Tail, Yousei Gakuen: Yankee-kun to Yankee-chan, Fairy Tail x Rave, FAIRY TAIL S
status: Fairy Tail S: Tales from Fairy Tail, Yousei Gakuen: Yankee-kun to Yankee-chan, Fairy Tail x Rave, FAIRY TAIL S
description:
Description :
        Volume 1
1. Aoneko Happy (あおネコハッピー); Doujinshi, Pray for Japan (2011)
2. Yousei-tachi no Batsu-game (妖精たちの罰ゲーム); Magazine Special 2013-08
3. Okaeri, Frosch (おかえり、フロッシュ); Bessatsu Shounen Magazine 2014-04
4. 413 Days (413DAYS); Magazine Special 2014-04
5. Sono Onna, Erza (その女、エルザ); Young Magazine 2014 #18
6. Natsu vs. Mavis (ナツ vs. メイビス); Magazine Special 2015-02
7. Fairy Tail of the Dead Meeeeeeeeen (FAIRY TAIL OF THE DEAD MEEEEEEEEEN); Shounen Magazine 2015 #17
8. Yousei-tachi no Christmas (妖精たちのクリスマス); Magazine Special 2015-12
9. Tokubetsu Irai. Kininaru Kare ni Chuui se yo! (特別依頼。気になる彼に注意せよ！); Shounen Magazine 2007 #5

Volume 2
1. Yousei Gakuen: Yankee-kun to Yankee-chan (妖精学園 ヤンキー君とヤンキーちゃん); Shounen Magazine #2008/1/11 Zoukan Dragon
2. Youkoso Fairy Hills!! (ようこそ フェアリーヒルズ!!); Magazine Special 2009-12
3. Niji no Sakura (虹の桜); Bessatsu Shounen Magazine 2010-04
4. Fairy Tail x Rave (FAIRYTAIL×RAVE); Magazine Special 2011-05
5. Fairy Woman (フェアリーウーマン); Magazine Special 2012-09
6. Natsu to Asuka (ナツとアスカ); Gekkan Shounen Magazine 2014-05
7. Lucy to Migi (ルーシィとミギー); Gekkan Afternoon 2015-10
8. Fairy Tail: Stone Age (FAIRYTAIL STONE AGE); Magazine Special 2016-07
9. Coca-Cola Collaboration Bangai-hen (Coca-Cola コラボ番外編); Coca-Cola 2010 Haishin Happy Teens Club

Compilation of side stories not included in the main entry.
